Name: Skitterers
Powers: Maneouverable - May turn once at any point during a move or charge

Name: Bomb Squad
Powers: AP 4 - Reduce block rolls by 4. Insane - Dies after combat.

Name: Beserkers
Powers: Random mover - Roll a die for movement and charging. 1-2 -> 1 space 3-4 -> 2 spaces 5-6 -> 3 spaces You must move the full distance, or collide with something. If the unit moves off the board, it is lost. Maneouverable - May turn once at any point during a move or charge

Name: Warriors
Powers: Unstable - Instead of rolling to flee, lose extra wounds for every point you lost combat.

Name: Archers
Powers: Unstable - Instead of rolling to flee, lose extra wounds for every point you lost combat.

Name: Revenants
Powers: Unstable - Instead of rolling to flee, lose extra wounds for every point you lost combat. Revenants - After combat, add a new revenant for each enemy that died.

Name: Fodder
Powers: Unstable - Instead of rolling to flee, lose extra wounds for every point you lost combat.

Name: Warriors
Powers: Poison - 6s to hit can't be saved by armour

Name: Webspitters
Powers: Poison - 6s to hit can't be saved by armour Spit Webs - Opponents that start a combat with this unit gain strikes last for the turn.

Name: Trappers
Powers: Poison - 6s to hit can't be saved by armour Web Sacs - Enemies can't use evasion against this unit

Name: Huntsmen
Powers: Poison - 6s to hit can't be saved by armour Flexible - Turn to face any direction at the start of your turn

Name: Chumpwagon
Powers: Trojan Rats - When this unit is wiped out, place a unit of Ratkin Warriors (same level as this) either in the same cell, or one of the four adjacent cells. You choose which direction they are facing.

Name: Battering-Rat
Powers: Impact Hits d6+1 - If you get a charge bonus, do d6+1 attacks per model hitting on a 4+. These count towards who won combat.

Name: Ninjas
Powers: Smoke Bombs - Once per game before combat, move this unit forward 2. This can go through any unit but must end in an unoccupied space. This can bring the unit into a new combat.

Name: Heavies
Powers: Stalwart - Add 1 to leadership rolls

Name: Swarmaltar
Powers: Aura of the Swarm - Free action: Revive d6 rats in an adjacent common unit. If you have two Swarmaltars select up to two different adjacent units. Limited to the starting number of rats.

Name: Feastaltar
Powers: Aura of Power - Adjacent rats gain +1 to hit in melee

Name: Starchucker
Powers: War Machine - Dies if it flees. Can't move into combat. Razorstar - Pick a straight line and roll a d6 for each model in this unit. For each shot, the first unit in that range gets one attack that hits on 3+, AP -3, and does 3 wounds. If it hits, the next unit takes a 4+, AP -2, 2 wound attack. If that hits, the third unit takes a 5+, AP -1, 1 wound attack. This shot can't pass through terrain. Friendly Fire - Can shoot into combat and into friendly units.

Name: Boombox
Powers: War Machine - Dies if it flees. Can't move into combat. The Big Guns - Pick a target square within 6. Roll a die for each model in this unit. 6 - Direct hit. 5 - Off by one, your choice. 4 - Off by one, towards the opponents board edge. 3 - Off by one, towards your board edge. 2 - Off by two, opponent's choice where. 1 - Hit yourself. The central tile takes d6 attacks, 3+ AP -1. The four adjacent tiles take 1 hit each, 4+ AP0. Friendly Fire - Can shoot into combat and into friendly units.

Name: Flagellants
Powers: Unbreakable - Can't flee Rabid - Must charge if able to

Name: Tincans
Powers: Stalwart - Add 1 to leadership rolls Slow - Don't roll a bonus charge dice

Name: Wolf Chariots
Powers: Impact Hits d3 - If you get a charge bonus, do d3 attacks per model hitting on 4+. These count towards who won combat.

Name: Bangwagons
Powers: Insane - Dies after combat. Powder Keg - d6 attacks per model AP 4 - Reduce block rolls by 4. Fast Charger - Rolls two charge bonus die, so it can travel up to two extra squares on the charge.
